name: My Grandmother's Cabbage and Noodles
author: brycensmommy
summary: I don't like cabbage, really. But my grandmother passed this recipe down. If you like bacon and noodles, then you'll love this. You can't even taste the cabbage.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place water and butter in a large, deep skillet and bring to a boil; stir in bacon and return to a boil
Stir cabbage into the bacon mixture; simmer until the thickest pieces of cabbage are fork-tender and the liquid has almost evaporated, about 20 minutes
Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil
Stir in egg noodles and return to a boil
Cook noodles uncovered, stirring occasionally, until tender but still slightly firm, about 5 minutes
Lightly toss egg noodles with bacon and cabbage; season to taste with salt and black pepper
